message: “The Hope Center Indy has the potential of saving countless women from the horrors of human trafficking and helping them recover from past mental trauma and physical injuries”

data.description: INDIANAPOLIS — A center to help women escaping human trafficking has opened at the Hancock-Marion county line. Organizers of Hope Center Indy, the former Marion County Home at 11850 Brookville Road,…
data.title: Fresh start: Center serving victims of human trafficking opens
